result.execSummary:
The defendant David Reyes Mixtaga was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Total fines and court costs to be payed by payment plan commencing June 1st, 2016 at a rate of $50 per month.  Failure to pay will result in one day jail for each $25 owed for contempt of court.
Defendant to submit a DNA sample

ADDRESS INFO for David Reyes Mixtaga
Current: 154 East 22nd Street, Apt. #1, Chicago Heights, IL 60411 United States  (Effective: 05-11-2016)
Prior: 1401 W Orchard St, Milwaukee, WI 53204

Defendant David Reyes Mixtaga in court with attorney Spiros Stavros Nicolet.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter John Vaughn in court.  Counsel submits plea questionnaire and waiver.  Court examines defendant as to the waiver.  Defendant enter a guilty plea.  Court accepts the plea, finding it free and voluntary.  Court finds the defendant guilty.  Court renders judgment.
Further proceedings on May 11, 2016 at 08:45 am.

Court interpreter John Vaughn / Defendant David Reyes Mixtaga in court with attorney Spiros Stavros Nicolet.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court is informed defendant has a driver's license. Plea of not guilty entered.  Further proceedings scheduled for May 11, 2016 at 08:45 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: w/condition:  not to operate motor vehicle w/out valid dl.

Defendant David Reyes Mixtaga appearing by video conferencing from the Ozaukee County Jail and with attorney Spiros Stavros Nicolet, appearing in person.  Defendant in custody. Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court examining defendant.  Counsel advises defendant will be in need of an interpreter at future dates.  State requesting signature bond.  Court orders case transferred to Specialty Court - Interpreter Court with Branch 1.  Plea hearing scheduled for March 24, 2016 at 08:00 am.
Per Dispatch, subject is in custody on warrant
Defendant David Reyes Mixtaga not in court. Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds probable cause, issues arrest warrant and forfeits bail.
